Is Holt-Oram syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,Holt-Oram syndrome
What are the treatments for Holt-Oram syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Holt-Oram syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Holt-Oram Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Holt-
